column3: for lunch to celebrate a family member's birthday. In addition to being busy as a weekend day
column4: it's in the second week now of Restaurant Week
column5: so I know that's a crazy
column6: harried time for all the staff. Despite that! our server (Daniel) was fantastic. Knowledgeable
column8: and very friendly. The food itself was delicious - I particularly recommend the Seared Salmon with cucumber crema and squash. It was melt-in-your-mouth good
column9: and the crema plus roasted squash was an awesome combination. The serving sizes are bigger than we all expected
column10: to boot! Daniel even took it upon himself to bring my brother
column12: a dessert on the house with a little candle in it. Adorable.
